SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT B.CODE_NM SYS_NM , C.CODE_NM COMPN_PCKAGE , A.SCRIN_ID , A.SCRIN_ENGL_NM , A.SCRIN_NM , A.SCRIN_DC , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.ETC_DC FROM OE1TNSCRIN A LEFT JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD B ON A.SYS_NM = B.CODE AND B.CODE_ID = 'OE1031' LEFT JOIN OE1TNOECOMMDETAILCD C ON A.COMPN_PCKAGE = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'OE1030' WHERE 1=1
B.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
C.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
A.SCRIN_ENGL_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
A.SCRIN_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
ORDER BY A.LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM DESC
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM OE1TNSCRIN WHERE 1=1
SYS_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
COMPN_PCKAGE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
SCRIN_ENGL_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
SCRIN_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%')
SELECT SYS_NM , COMPN_PCKAGE , SCRIN_ID , SCRIN_ENGL_NM , SCRIN_NM , SCRIN_DC , ATCH_FILE_ID , ETC_DC FROM OE1TNSCRIN WHERE SCRIN_ID = #scrinId#
